rows.label: tlk42350212_02_msg0001
rows.name:
We have auctions here almost every day,
but a Core Crystal has never been
put up for sale, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_02_msg0002
rows.name:
This is because there are few Nopon with the
aptitude to be a Driver, and...

rows.label: tlk42350212_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Core Crystals are taken to Acedia to be
refined, so they don't just end up here,
mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_02_msg0004
rows.name:
So, a Driver might be curious and peek in
here from time to time, but you'll only be
disappointed if you get your hopes up, mo!
